channel.title: Defeating An Evil Pirate? Billy Lvl. 2
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Defeating An Evil Pirate? Billy Lvl. 2" - Help clearing the B-Rank Genjutsu Mission, Defeat an evil pirate?

item.title: Re: Defeating An Evil Pirate? Billy Lvl. 2
item.content:encoded:
• Ally:
    • From B-rank Tai you can get Rover's Mom (+1 Range) from Tame a Scout Wolf! (Tai 9D 9S, Gen 7D 6S).
    • From B-rank Gen you can get Sicko (+1 Gen Range) from Discover a Cure! (Gen 11D 7S, Tai 7D 7S)
  • Jutsu:
    • Lil' Bo can teach you Welcome to Good Burger (+2 Range, 50 Chakra, Require Tasty Burger)
    • Shorty can teach you Kido: Metalocalypse (+2 Gen Successes, +1 Gen Range, 150 Chakra)
    • If you are RedEye you can learn Water Clone Technique (+1 Range, 100 Chakra) found on Clean the Pool (D-Rank)
  • Items:
    • K-Dog's Headband (+1 Range) get it from Super Rare in Prize Wheel
    • Chakra Armor (+1 Range) buy it in the Shop for 25000 Ryo
    • Counterfeit Permit (+1 Gen Range, doesn't loop) buy it the Shop for 25000 Ryo

item.title: Defeating An Evil Pirate? Billy Lvl. 2
item.content:encoded:
I'm not sure how to get Billy Lvl 2… I currently have a Genjutsu Range of 1-11. And it doesnt seem to be enough for the quest.
I can complete it when I have the RoShamBo Redux Bonuses, however, I can't find a team which will work well if I include BIlly…
DOes anyone have any suggestions on Allies, Permanent Items or even jutsus, etc. to get in order to finish the Quest?
I am currently lvl 37. Special Jonin (NIN), with 12 Genjutsu level.
Thanks for your help everyone =]
